title: I got banned for leaving a custom game without any previous leaves.
body:
I had played a few games in a row, when i get on the next day i want to see how ireilias abilities scale (to physical dmg or Ap) and i leave without any bots in the game and i leave 35 seconds in and get put in the leavebuster que which is not the worst i can wait ten minutes. But every time i try to que up it resets back to 10 minutes and if i cannot play why wait in a leavebuster que when nothing will pop up but if it does and i dont accept than it will probably reset and i know it isnt a consistant problem but that leaving a custom game shouldnt count against me and not only that but it isnt on my match history as a leave so i am in leavebuster que for no reason
Please fix this riot
i know u wont stop it while i wait but this is rediculous and needs to be reported

replies.body:
PentaKill Bruh,

I wish I could help you out, but I can't. Those cases have to be handled by player support.

Sorry for the confusion. You did not get a leaver buster penalty for leaving the custom bot game. Recently many players were having connectivity issues, so we turned the leaverbuster system off temporarily. Now that the issue has been resolved, the system has been turned back on. It just so happens that you had a punishment to serve when the system was turned off. You may have forgotten about it, or thought you completely served the punishment.

Leaverbuster detects AFKs as well as leaves, so the offending game may not be evident in your match history. Now that the system is back online, punishments and the reduction of them will be applied directly after the game. That should help out greatly with the confusion.
